about_the_game:
Dance the night away with Detective Zomby!
The official soundtrack of "Zombie Police" featuring original BGM tracks.
Enjoy Gen Hatanaka's compositions that colored the whimsical investigations and case resolutions anytime you want.

- Usage Guidelines for Soundtrack

  • Individuals and organizations may use the music tracks without permission for video content. When using the tracks, please clearly credit "Zombie Police" in the video or in the description.
  • For commercial use other than in video content, please contact us for permission and details.
  • The use of these music tracks is limited to the purchaser (individual or company). Transferring, redistributing, or sharing the music tracks with third parties is strictly prohibited.

Enjoy Gen Hatanaka's compositions that colored the whimsical investigations and case resolutions anytime you want.
